system.description:
Raises the temperature of a combustible, inanimate object to flash point and starts a fire. The object must be within SI yards and line of sight. Time to invoke and start the fire (15 – SI) seconds takes longer when object is chilled or wet. Once the object begins to burn, the invoker has no control over the fire.

The talent may be used to warm objects to a desired temperature less than flash point, but CF may cause ignition. The talent has no effect on objects possessing aura or ego, including the invoker.

Psionic Episodes: When the character is in a condition of stress, nearby objects sometimes smolder or burst into flame.

Misfire (CF): The wrong object(s) ignite.
